name: Banket
author: BKET
summary: My husband's family is Dutch and this is a recipe from the Netherlands that is a great tasting pastry using almond paste.   Enjoy!
directions: In a large bowl, cut cold butter or margarine into flour until the mixture has a crumb-like texture
Make a well in the center, add cold water
Mix together until the mixture forms a ball
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (225 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, blend together almond paste, eggs, 3/4 cup sugar, almond extract and salt
Divide dough in 4 parts, and roll into 15 inch strips
Place filling along the center of each long strip of dough
Roll up, and pinch the ends to seal
Place strips 2 inches apart on cookie sheet
Brush with egg white, and sprinkle with the remaining sugar
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until golden
